message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a starting price of $14,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the product's value is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice. Considering my budget, could we discuss the possibility of the product being offered at $12,500?
